page.title: 10A Killamarsh Teacher
page.content: Mrs. Batty is a teacher at St Giles school.She likes her job very much and is not keen on the school dinners.She gets on with the teachers very well. The children like her and she likes them.Mrs. Batty only likes p.e if the children behave.She only tells the children off if she has to.She would do after school activities if she had time.She likes getting away from the children at break and doesn't have a teachers pet because it's not fair.Mrs. Batty hates getting up early.Her best subjects are maths and drama.She has thirty one children in her class.She doesn't live far from school so she walks.Mrs Batty doesn't think she's paid enough but she likes her school very much.She has recently had some time off school to have her first baby who is called Eleanor.It is a busy life but one that she enjoys.
